[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.1 Purpose: The Cricket Management System (CMS) defines requirements for managing cricket matches, player statistics, ticketing, and fan engagement.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.2 Scope: CMS enables users to schedule matches, track player performance, manage team rosters, and facilitate ticket sales.

[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.1 System Interfaces: CMS integrates with sports analytics tools, ticketing platforms, and live streaming services.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.2 User Interfaces: CMS provides a web-based and mobile-friendly UI for team managers, players, and fans.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.3 Hardware Interfaces: CMS supports live match scoring through electronic scoreboard integration.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.4 Software Interfaces: CMS integrates with API services for live scores, weather updates, and ticket bookings.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.5 Communications Interfa: CMS ensures secure user communication via TLS encryption and notification services.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.6 Memory Constraints: CMS optimizes data storage for historical match records and real-time analytics.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.7 Operations: CMS automates team management, match scheduling, ticketing, and player performance tracking.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.8 Site Adaptation Requir: CMS supports multilingual content and multi-region match scheduling.
[SUBSEC] 1.3 Product Perspective.[SUBSUBSEC] 1.3.9 Interfaces with Servic: CMS connects with broadcasting networks, sports databases, and ticketing agencies.

[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.4 Product Functions: CMS provides match scheduling, live score tracking, player performance analysis, and fan engagement.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.5 User Characteristics: CMS serves team managers, players, tournament organizers, and fans.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.6 Limitations: CMS requires an active internet connection for real-time updates and ticket bookings.
[SEC] 1. Introduction.[SUBSEC] 1.7 Assumptions and Dependencie: CMS depends on sports data providers, ticketing APIs, and regulatory approvals.
[SUBSEC] 1.8 Definitions: Match Schedule: Fixture details for upcoming matches.

[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-001: The system shall integrate with sports analytics platforms to track player statistics.
[SUBSEC] 2.1 External Interfaces.REQ-INTF-002: The system shall support secure ticket purchases through third-party payment gateways.

[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-001: The system shall allow users to view upcoming match schedules and venues (REQ-DB-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-002: The system shall enable team managers to manage player rosters and match lineups.
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-003: The system shall provide real-time live score updates for ongoing matches (REQ-INTF-001).
[SUBSEC] 2.2 Functions.REQ-FUNC-004: The system shall track player performance metrics such as runs, wickets, and strike rates.

[SUBSEC] 2.3 Usability Requirements.REQ-USAB-001: The system shall offer an intuitive UI for match updates, team management, and ticketing.

[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-001: The system shall process match updates within 2 seconds under normal conditions.
[SUBSEC] 2.4 Performance Requirements.REQ-PERF-002: The system shall support at least 100,000 concurrent users without performance degradation.

[SUBSEC] 2.5 Logical Database Requiremen.REQ-DB-001: The system shall store match results, player statistics, ticket sales, and fan engagement data.

[SUBSEC] 2.6 Design Constraints.REQ-DSGN-001: The system shall comply with international sports data reporting standards.

[SUBSEC] 2.7 Standards Compliance.REQ-COMP-001: The system shall adhere to data security regulations, including GDPR and PCI DSS.

[SUBSEC] 2.8 Software System Attributes.REQ-ATTR-001: The system shall ensure data integrity, secure transactions, and seamless user experience (REQ-DSGN-001).

[SEC] 3. Verification: Match accuracy checks, ticket sales validation, and security audits ensure reliability.
[SEC] 4. Supporting Information: User manuals, API documentation, and sports data integration guidelines.
[SEC] 5. References: GDPR compliance, PCI DSS guidelines, and international cricket regulations.
